title: Vanishing Point (1971) (Barry Newman, Cleavon Little)
description:
VANISHING POINT - 1971 (Uncut) 

The Original.

IMDb Rating: 7.2 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0067927/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0067927/</a>

  Barry Newman stars as Kowalski, a taciturn driver who bets his pusher (drug provider) that he can drive a new Dodge Challenger from Denver to San Francisco in 15 hours. He loads up on amphetamines and begins his odyssey through the contemporary west while a funky black DJ (Cleavon Little) turns the driver into a folk hero and broadcasts advice on dodging the cops. Kowalski's checkered life story is told through flashbacks as he drives west.

NOTE: This is the uncut version and is about 5 minutes longer than the IMDb listing. The scene with the hitch-hiker (Charlotte Rampling) at about the 1 hour 30 minute mark, was originaly cut but was included for this version.

  Starring: Barry Newman, Cleavon Little, Dean Jagger, Victoria Medlin, Gilda Texter, Charlotte Rampling, Paul Koslo.

  Directed by: Richard C. Sarafian.

  Quality: Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 46min.
